sentence.Network_cn: 假定大家都想变得更有自知之明。

sentence.Network_en: Deep inside the awareness was stirring that something was about to happen.
sentence.Network_cn: 内心深处隐隐感觉到有什么事即将发生。

entry.def: If you are aware of something, you know about it.

example.ex: Smokers are well aware of the dangers to their own health...
example.tran: 吸烟的人都知道吸烟对自身健康的危害。

example.ex: He should have been aware of what his junior officers were doing...
example.tran: 他本应该清楚自己下级们的所作所为。

entry.tran: 注意到的；察觉到的；意识到的
entry.def: If you are aware of something, you realize that it is present or is happening because you hear it, see it, smell it, or feel it.

example.ex: She was acutely aware of the noise of the city...
Jane was suddenly aware that she was digging her nails into her thigh.
example.tran: 简突然间意识到她正在用指甲抠大腿。

entry.def: Someone who is aware notices what is happening around them or happening in the place where they live.

sentences.sentence: "he had no awareness of his mistakes"
"his sudden consciousness of the problem he faced"
"their intelligence and general knowingness was impressive"

means.word_mean: 2. state of elementary or undifferentiated consciousness;

auth_sentence.content: This has led to more awareness and more protests.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 未认识到的,未察觉到的,不知道的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un没有,未+aware[adj.意识到的]→adj.未认识到的,未察觉到的,不知道的
aware[adj.意识到的]+ness状态→n.知道, 晓得

Sentence.sentence: To arouse Americans' awareness of the energy crisis.
Enhancing people's awareness of their own health.
We learn from Paragraph 2 that reinforcement, whether direct or indirect, can help increase children's awareness of gender roles.
J's (Biography of John Muir)-John Muir's own writings to bring readers a life story of this remarkable man who did so much to raise American's awareness of environmental issues.
His writing and speaking raised the awareness of the importance of conservation and helped bring about our national park system

sentences.en: a growing awareness of healthy living
sentences.cn: 不断增强的健康生活的意识

sentences.en: Environmental awareness has increased over the years.
sentences.cn: 这些年来人们的环境意识增强了。

sentences.en: There is a general awareness that smoking is harmful.
sentences.cn: 人们普遍认识到吸烟有害健康。
